overview: Through a car accident, a young pilot gets to know a girl who works as a fashion model in the city. She leaves her fianc√© in front of him and applies for a job as a stewardess. The inspection shows that she, like her brother, suffers from tuberculosis. The pilot abandons her, but her ex-fiancee comes to visit her at the sanatorium and marries her. However, their happiness is overshadowed by the death of their child from tuberculosis...
title: Wit Wint
